choices.default: Existing content in a plain text page

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: layout
fields.instructions:
Your page is created by adding "layout modules" (or "blocks") which stack on top of each other. Each block can be highly customised to create unique page layouts!
Tip: Try collapsing and expanding modules if the interface gets too cluttered. This is done by simply clicking the module name

sub_fields.label: Dates & Times Button: Label
sub_fields.name: button_a_label
sub_fields.instructions:
This is button shows up below the Locations & Times.
Intended Use: While the button can be whatever you what, it is intended to act as a "View More" for the Location & Times. To setup the button with this in mind you'll need to link it to a page that has the "Dates & Locations" Module.

sub_fields.label: Dates & Times Button: Link To Page
sub_fields.name: button_a_url

sub_fields.label: Additional Button: Label
sub_fields.name: button_b_label
sub_fields.instructions:
This button shows below the Dates & Times button.
Intended Use: Act as a button to key content your visitors will be looking for. eg. "News". (leave blank to hide)

sub_fields.message: Your Location & Dates will show up here. To add/edit locations visit the admin page "Location & Dates"
Your Menu/s will show up here. To add/edit menus visit the admin page "Menus"

sub_fields.label: Choose Menus to show
sub_fields.name: menus
sub_fields.instructions: Menus in the right column will be shown on the website. Click menus in the left column to add them to the right column. You can reorder them too.

sub_fields.message:
This will output a basic contact form with preset fields. Any submissions will be sent to the site's Email Address (Can be changed on the Settings > General page.

Looking for something more advanced or customisable? Try Contact Form 7. The plugin will give you a 'shortcode' which you can enter in the advance layout module.

Fields shown:
  • • Name
  • • Email / Phone
  • • Message (Textbox)

Not receiving submissions? Check your spam folder or contact your hosting provider about email deliverability.

sub_fields.label: Success Message
sub_fields.name: success_message
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to show a generic message

sub_fields.message: Your subscribe form will appear hereEvery subscriber will automatically be added to a "list" in your Mail Chimp Account. First, you'll need to connect your mail chimp account

sub_fields.label: Mailchimp List ID
sub_fields.name: mailchimp_list_id
sub_fields.instructions: Submitted email addresses will be added to an existing "list" in your mailchimp account. Find your list ID: http://kb.mailchimp.com/lists/managing-subscribers/find-your-list-id

sub_fields.label: Custom Amount
sub_fields.name: space_custom
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a pixel number for the amount of space you'd like. Typical values are around "30 - 100" px, but it's totally up to you!

layouts.name: background
layouts.label: Layout: Start a New Background Color

sub_fields.message: The Following modules will adopt this new background color

sub_fields.label: Text Color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: (leave blank to fallback to default color)
